name: ASCII Copy
description:
Copy the ascii code that was displayed in order to get scores. Make sure you do that with the least amount of time possible as well!

Instructions

When you see red dot, click left mouse

When you see white dot, click right mouse
 When there's only white dots, you can click Space, to skip all those dots and move to next line
 At the end, you will able to see the original message, your inputted message, your score and your time taken
 I dare you to do this 200 seconds. Can you do it?

This submission for 3 hour game jam Trijam is not perfect in any way so please do comment about any issues you find so that I can fix it up!
Max Score : 101
Please do play in full screen mode so that any mishap with UI will not affect you from playing the game!
